attributes.action: Forcably repatriate ginger people to the Falkland Islands
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: "Gingers"—those with red hair, freckles, and pale skin —are creepy and evil. They suffer from "gingervitis" and their light skin comes from a lack of soul. They should be sent for their own good to a place with less sunlight, due to global warming gingers are only going to be exposed to more sunlight in the UK.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
